short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Users can use this extension to easily generate trading API token's for major stock brokers.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This extension generates broker authentication token for API development purposes.

Steps to get the token-
1. Install the extension from web store.
2. Login to your trading terminal in the browser where this extension is installed.
3. After login, click on the extension icon and you will see your token is generated for the relevant brokers.
4. Click on the blurred text and copy the respective token.

Supported brokers:
Zerodha
Fyers
